name: Just Michael
description:
Michael woke up in a very weird dungeon. He doesn't remember anything about how he got there. Can you help him recover his memory and find out where he is?

Just Michael is going to be a vertical platformer and a little RPG game. 

E = Talk / Using

Q = Quests (menu)

1,2,3,4 = Item slot / Book  chapter

Numpad = Shop Items

B = Buy

Arrows = Move / Switch pages

Esc = Menu Screen

P = Restart Level
